description:
For the last command box in
http://nova.openstack.org/adminguide/distros/ubuntu.10.04.html , the first line should be 'apt-get' not 'add-get'
title: typo in installing for Ubuntu 10.04 doc

comments.content:
For the last command box in
http://nova.openstack.org/adminguide/distros/ubuntu.10.04.html , the first and second line should 'apt-get' not 'add-get'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rerngvit
